Class ChangeSimulation

java.lang.Object
ChangeSimulation
public class ChangeSimulation
extends java.lang.Object
Simulates transaction with a drawer. After calling the run method the simulation continues until the user chooses to no longer simulate transactions.
Author:
Wil Simpson

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) boolean continueRunning
    Whether to keep accepting inputs from the user or end the program

    • getFloatInput

      private float getFloatInput​(java.lang.String messageHeader, java.lang.String message)
      Prints the message header then the message to the console. Then gets the console input. The message will be sent and user input will be taken until a valid float is given.
      Parameters:
      messageHeader - message that gives the other message more context
      message - message asking what value the user should input
      Returns:
      float input from console

    • getIntegerInput

      private int getIntegerInput​(java.lang.String message)
      Prints the message to the console and gets the user input to the message. The message will be sent and user input will be taken until a valid int is given.
      Parameters:
      message - message to show the console
      Returns:
      int input from console

    • getIntegerInput

      private int getIntegerInput​(java.lang.String messageHeader, java.lang.String message)
      Prints the header message, then the message to the console and gets the user input to the message. The message will be sent and user input will be taken until a valid int is given.
      Parameters:
      messageHeader - message that gives the other message more context
      message - message to show the console
      Returns:
      int input from console
